product_name: ASICS GEL-Scram Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built with lightweight cushioning for comfort during long, hard runs, the ASICS GEL-Scram(TM) Trail-Running Shoes offer traction on rough and muddy trails. Uppers feature a combination of rugged synthetics and mesh for a comfortable fit and high durability. Rearfoot GEL(R) cushioning system absorbs shock during the impact phase of your stride and allows for a smooth transition to midstance. Nonmarking outsoles have reversed lugs that provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of terrain. Insoles can be removed to accommodate your custom orthotics. Closeout.
short_description: Built with lightweight cushioning for comfort during long, hard runs, the ASICS GEL-Scram(TM) Trail-Running Shoes offer traction on rough and muddy trails.
